title: My password changed by itself
body:
Dear Riot,

I lost the email to my account which is snip and my password changed so i don't have any other way of getting it back. 
Is there anyway i can move that account to my other email?
the email i use that account on is snip and i wish to change it to snip  if possible.

Sincerely,
Davin Pheach

replies.body: Account security is really important, so I've edited out your account name and information as it's a security risk to post it in a public venue.  Reach out to us privately through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and our account team can help.  We'll reply back asap!
